author: StatikTiming
comment: Looks great. But doesn't sync with Google fit or heart rate which I want. Can't even refund the purchase. What a joke of a watch face.

author: M. G.
comment: I liked it but it spams you notification bar until you go in and turn it off. Not cool.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: You will receive only one notification per new watch face released. It will not be spammy :) Did you receive more? If yes, that's an issue... Otherwise, you can deactivate the notification from the settings screen once for all (as explained in the notification).

author: Eileen Burton
comment: I paid $ 2.99 now it's saying I didn't pay for it and it keeps changing on my watch nor impressed..

author: Edo de Roo
comment: I use this watch face quite often, as it has a nice two-tone adjustable color, and helpful complications.

author: Yupeng Zhang
comment: Double charged on both phone and watch, and the premium feature is not enabled on watch after payment. No way to request refund.

author: Jens Backeman
comment: It actually gave me what I was looking for, though the step counter doesn't seem to sync with Google Fit, which is to bad.

author: HWCM
comment: I like this watch face, but it uses a lot of battery. It is using twice the battery as the default watch face.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Do you use any features like the heart rate data, or an ambient mode other than eco? Those 2 features use more battery.

author: Jay Beddow
comment: Excellent. One question when it is in ECO or black and white mode is it moving steadily  to keep the pled screen safe?

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Not actually. Generally it is something directly handled by the watch device itself if necessary.

author: By Leo
comment: Paid premium but still only getting the demo watch

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Please send me your order number so that I can check your order status. Email me at thema.apps@gmail.com

author: Joel Bravo
comment: Didn't get time to use but it's ok so far

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Do you have any issue associated to this rating? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

author: Owynn MacKean
comment: Premium access to be able to actually use it. Not advertised that way.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. You can use the watch face without the premium access. A lot of features are already  available for free. The main purpose of the free version is to try the design and see if you like it. Everything is advertised in the description of the google play store page. If it was a paid app, you would have nothing for free.

author: moe hedjazi
comment: Pay for everything

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. You can not have every thing for free;) the main purpose of the free version is to try the design and see if you like it. There are already a lot of options available for free. If it was a paid app you would have nothing for free

comment: Really like the design!

author: Robert Haberman
comment: Nice job!

author: Avinash Ganga
comment: Superb app

author: rehan shaikh
comment: Excellent

author: Amir Dehdarirad
comment: One of the best watch faces for my sony smart wstch 3.Gives me awesome app access

author: Elvin Torok
comment: Is it possible to try the premium features before buying?

author: Keith Burgess
comment: Still tying to launch it

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you install it on your watch? There should be an installation invite notification. If not or dismissed, please go in the Google Play store on your watch and find it with a search ;)

author: 10xion
comment: Didn't think I would like it. Ended up loving it. The ways to change the styles of my Q Explorists watch face are endless.  Only downside is the txt and email icons don't respond when tapped. But there's other ways to open them. Good job. 5 stars

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you activate the interactivity in the settings? It's in the last section. You will then be able to hit the widgets for more data, or to change the data displayed

author: Ronnel Manzana
comment: All the info I need on one screen plus an excellent always-on face.

author: Steven Gargaro
comment: Good looking watch face but kills the battery in my moto360. About 10% per hour.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Do you use the heart rate sensor or an Ambient mode other than eco?

author: Julie Page
comment: Finally found the right watch face for me!

author: Mary El Rodriguez
comment: It has everything in one

author: Stevie Z
comment: Smart looking, packed with features, very flexible! Loved it!

author: Greg I.
comment: Great, great , great and very functional AND customisable...

author: Stuart Gregg
comment: Great face and great service from author

author: Jonathan Mayer
comment: I would rate higher, but there seems to be no way to turn off the heart rate sensor when the watch is not on. This kills my battery if the watch isn't worn. I believe Wear has a way to detect if the watch is being worn. I wish the heart rate sensor took advantage of that.

author: Tomasz Olecki
comment: Pretty nice with quite a few configuration options. However not syncing heart rate to Google Fit makes regular checking of heart rate useless and unnecessary battery drain.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: If you do not use the heart rate sensor as a data for any of the widget, the sensor will be automatically disabled. So if you do not use it, no battery drain.

author: Daniele Cuppari
comment: probably one of the best looking watch face (digital) available..i've been looking for a decent watch faces for a long time..im kinda picky, and i was never able to find one that didnt look too cheesy..this one is amazing tho..clean and sharp..and with the premium features unlocked pretty much all customizable..

author: MYSTICmayonaise
comment: Last update seems to have completly broken the watch face, the companion app reloads everytime I leave it, never saves settings (even if I manually save a profile) and does not show up in the android wear app, or on my watch.  Unusable until fixed.  Also the menu for the watchface settings on the phone looks pretty janky, and has minimal feedback when you do various actions, such as no notifications for when you save/load a profile, change weather settings, and a slew of other things dont have any feedback as to whether or not it worked.  Edit: i dont have play store on ny smart watch.  After restarting my phone and watch multiple times and reinstalling the app on and off my phone 3 times, o got master to load again, and the settings seem to save now.  Upped to a 3 star review, which I'll change to 5 once the app itself gets a bit more polish and options and changes in app have some form of solid confirmation when doing things  Aside from that, I do really like how this app runs and looks

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Did you install the watch face on your watch too? If it does not appear in the Android Wear app, it means that you did not. Please go in the Google Play store on your watch and search for the watch face by swipping down the screen. Install it and everything should be solved

author: Andrea Hailes
comment: Great watch face, but eats battery when not worn - it doesn't turn off the heartbeat sensor

reply.author: thema
reply.content: The sensor is deactivated if you put it on the charging dock. But we can not determine if the watch is worn or not other than that

author: Brian Andrews
comment: Uses way too much battery.  Went back to my original face.

author: frank neudorff
comment: Awesome watch face with tons of options. Well worth less than 2$!

author: Ivan Darch
comment: Fabulous, the only watch face I've kept on my watch for ages. Thoroughly recommended.
Good watch face have it on my moto360 gen2 and my Asus zenwatch 3

author: Canadian Time-Vapers
comment: Very creative and fun watch face really enjoy using this design

author: Paul Kernohan
comment: Looks great super customer support excellent thank you!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Is it locked on both watch & mobile, or on the device that was not used to get the premium? Please send me an email at thema.apps@gmail.com, I'll be happy to help.

author: Norm Anderson
comment: It does exactly  what I  need
